DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective randomized trial comparing the outcome in women undergoing IVF/ICSI when taking their gonadotropin dosage in the morning (am) or evening (pm).
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Comparing Qam With Qpm Dosing in Assisted Reproductive Technologies (ART)
DOC.criteria: women between 2142 undergoing IVF women > 45, women with one ovary, donor egg, surrogacy, FET cycles, uterine problems, large fibroids
